trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around April 9th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile I was waiting for my bus at the Midway Orange Line Station, I saw a Military F-18 Hornet Jet coming out of from the east, heading right straight towards the middle of the runway, then it made a few upside down loops a few times, and then It flew right in made a very sharp turn and flew right out again, heading back towards east again within less then a minute time. I do not know why why he or she was doing this for, but it made a quite a few very weird strainge manouvers. like a acrobat. I thought it was going to crash right into Midway Airport, and that had really scared to death! Why would a Military Aircraft be doing aireobatic manouvers right in the middle of a public comercial airport? Does anyone knows the reason for this???... Thank you
Summary: Military Aircraft Flew In And Flew Right Out Of MDW
